DOC.brief_title: Driving Pressure And EFL Adult Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: During general anesthesia , functional residual capacity ( FRC ) reduce . If FRC low minimum volume require maintain opening airway ( close capacity ) , derecruitment lung parenchyma , lead phenomenon expiratory flow limitation ( EFL ) . Numerous factor contribute EFL , include hyperoxia , muscle paralysis , increase volume interstitial fluid inflammatory response . To establish presence EFL general anesthesia , developed test know PEEP test . It sudden removal 3 cm H2O value positive end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP test ) : EFL subtraction expiratory pressure produce increase expiratory flow . The use different modality mechanical ventilation cardiac surgery may impact incidence EFL post CEC . The Driving Pressure ( DP ) difference plateau pressure ( Pplateau ) Positive End-Expiratory Pressure ( PEEP ) , estimate lung strain . The primary end-point study : - Evaluate correlation DP EFL PPCs patient undergo elective cardiac surgery perform extracorporeal circulation . The secondary end-point study : - Consider whether factor associate development EFL , especially comorbidities ventilation mode surgery ; - Evaluate outcome duration mechanical ventilation , length stay intensive care ( ICU ) , PaO2/ FiO2 discharge ICU , development respiratory complication , duration hospital stay mortality . It prospective , observational , non-pharmacological study . It enroll 200 patient undergoing elective adult cardiac surgery . Respiratory rate set maintain PaCO2 value close eucapnia . It use pressure-controlled ventilation ( Pinsp ≤ 35 cm H2O ) control ventilation reach exceed maximum airway pressure . In case necessary check volume deliver ventilator really , entire period , chosen volume . The inspiratory way compose O2 , air maybe halogenated anesthetic . The O2 concentration increase gradually case desaturation maintain SpO2 93-95 % try exceed FiO2 0.8 choice protective ventilation strategy . Weaning CEC include single alveolar recruitment maneuver , airway pressure increase 40 cm H20 7 second . At end patient transfer Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) post-operative monitoring . During transfer support mechanical ventilation perform manually anesthetist resuscitator . Extubation ICU run accord protocol center . It could use postoperative analgesia provide NRS rest ≤ 3 dynamic NRS ( cough ) ≤ 4 allow active chest physical therapy ( CPT ) . In schedule post-operative treat collect follow data : - Postoperative mechanical ventilation time ; - Postoperative respiratory complication ; - Postoperative non-respiratory complication ( cardiovascular , infectious , kidney , surgical ) ; - The need re-intubation postoperative period ; - The need ventilatory support ( non-invasive ventilation , invasive ventilation ) postoperative period ; - Need hospitalization intensive care ( expect , unexpected , cause hospitalization , length stay ) ; - Length hospital stay ; - Other information postoperative relevant study The study interfere normal anesthetic activity , provide variation procedure currently use PEEP test use involve pathophysiological change patient . Data collect appropriate Case Report Form ( CRF ) . It collect anamnestic information , data surgery post-operative clinical data , particular respiratory parameter . Definitions use outcome measure accord standard European Perioperative Clinical Outcome ( EPCO ) definition [ Eur J Anaesthesiol 2015 ; 32:88-105 ] . Data analyze professional statistical software . Univariate multivariate analysis perform . Chi-square test use dichotomous variable , z-test/t-test Mann-Whitney U-test continuous variable , appropriate . Statistical significance p < 0.05 .
